info.title: Customer Trading Restrictions
info.description:
METHOD_API_MANAGE_TRADING - 24

Parameter Description
Restriction Type 1 = Buy, 2 = Sell, 3 = Both
Portfolios ALL or comma separated list of GTN portfolio numbers
Ex: P000064434, P000064433, P000064432
isEnabled 1= enable, 0 = disable

response.description:
Response Sample Success
Response: 1|Success
Response Sample Fail
Response: 0|Error

post.description:
Request
Request parameters tradingType|securityAc|isEnabled
Buy enable for institution level
eg.1 : 1|ALL|1
Buy disbale for institution level
1|ALL|0

Sell enable for institution level 2|ALL|1
Sell disbale for institution level 2|ALL|0

Both enable for institution level 3|ALL|1
Both disbale for institution level 3|ALL|0

Buy enable for one/multiple security accounts
eg.2 : 1|P000024027,P000023553|1
Buy disable for one/multiple security accounts 1|P000024027,P000023553|0

Sell enable for one/multiple security accounts 2|P000024027,P000023553|1
Sell disable for one/multiple security accounts
2|P000024027,P000023553|0

Both enable for one/multiple security accounts 3|P000024027,P000023553|1
Both disable for one/multiple security accounts 3|P000024027,P000023553|0
tradingType=1 (eg. 1)
securityAc = ALL (eg. 1)
securityAc = P000024027,P000023553 (eg. 2)
isEnabled = 1 (eg. 1)
Sample request for single record {
"institutionId":"136",
â€œmessageType": "24",
"messageID":"700",
"parameters":"1|ALL|1"
}
Sample request for multiple records {
"institutionId":"136",
"messageType":"24",
"messageID":"700",
"parameters":"1|P000024027,P000023553|1"
}
